domain.action.contracts

Interface IAction

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBasicUpdateSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionPromotion, AtomicAction, AtomicActionCatch, AtomicActionStep, CompositeAction, CompositeActionFly, CompositeActionFlyCatch

    public interface IAction
extends IBasicUpdateSource
    Basic interface for all possible actions a Player can perform with his IPieces.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void executeOn(IBoard board, Player currentPlayer)
      Executes this IAction on the given IBoard for the given Player.
      Location getFrom()
      Returns the start Location.
      boolean isCatch()
      Returns true if this IAction performs a catch, false otherwise.
      boolean isValidOn(IReadOnlyBoard board, Player currentPlayer)
      Returns true if this IAction is valid on the given IBoard and for the given Player, false otherwise.

      • Methods inherited from interface domain.update.contracts.IBasicUpdateSource

        isSubscribedBasic, subscribeBasic, unsubscribeBasic

    • Method Detail

      • isValidOn

        boolean isValidOn(IReadOnlyBoard board,
                  Player currentPlayer)
        Returns true if this IAction is valid on the given IBoard and for the given Player, false otherwise. Note: This method only checks the IAction in its own limited scope. Game rules about priority moves etc. are ignored here.

      • executeOn

        void executeOn(IBoard board,
               Player currentPlayer)
        Executes this IAction on the given IBoard for the given Player. Execution cannot proceed if this IAction is not valid on the given IBoard.

      • getFrom

        Location getFrom()
        Returns the start Location.

      • isCatch

        boolean isCatch()
        Returns true if this IAction performs a catch, false otherwise.
